title.rendered: Code of Conduct Public Hearing & Board of Education Meeting on June 8

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a Code of Conduct public hearing at 6:45 p.m. and a regular meeting at 7 p.m. on June 8.  The public hearing and the Board of Education meeting will be held in the Teaching Auditorium at Saratoga Springs High School.  Watch the meeting through youtube.

Click here to view a draft of the 2022-2023 Code of Conduct.

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
